name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Annette RUIZ, Appellant

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, Z APPAL A, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, jj.
ZAPPALA, J., concurs in the result.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Annette RUIZ, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
For the reasons stated in the opinion filed in Commonwealth v. Corporan, — Pa. -, 613 A.2d 530 (1992), we affirm.
ZAPPALA, J., concurs in the result.
CAPPY, J., notes his dissent.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Norris E. Gelman, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Ronald Eisenberg, Deputy Dist. Atty., Catherine Marshall, Chief, Appeals Div., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
613 A.2d 538
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Annette RUIZ, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted April 8, 1992.
Decided June 17, 1992.
Norris E. Gelman, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Ronald Eisenberg, Deputy Dist. Atty., Catherine Marshall, Chief, Appeals Div., for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, Z APPAL A, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, jj.
